MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 23-NOV-2020 21:42.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G2 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:39pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Kings Theatre substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:01pm on Monday, 23 November 2020.
